price: (63) But if they turn away, then indeed - Allāh is Knowing of the corrupters.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna
